website_summaries.verdict: The Shield TV is a powerful Android TV-based media streaming microconsole with plenty of gaming tricks and hands-free Google Assistant support to help justify its hefty price tag.
pros: Streaming game options work very well
cons: Streaming games requires a very fast and reliable network connection

customer_reviews.title: In a different league to any other media box out there
customer_reviews.text: I've had a few Android media boxes and for the most part they have been pretty good at what they do. The Nvidia Shield, however, is on a completely different level. This tiny little box is absolutely packed with power. Everything is so responsive and 'instant' it just feels so much more intuitive and inviting to use. The things it can handle is just amazing. I can honestly say this is one of the best gadgets I've ever bought, it's transformed the way we use our TV. Yes it's quite pricey but believe me, it's worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Speirs

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't provide 5.1 surround sound well enough
customer_reviews.text: Netflix and Amazon apps use Dolby Digital Plus, which although CAN be downgraded to earlier versions of 5.1 sound - the developers have chosen not to support it. So if you have an older AV receiver which uses an optical connection, it is impossible to have anything more than stereo sound from Netflix and Amazon on this device. This limitation is missing completely from the NVIDIA sales material and web site - so this review loses 4 stars for lack of transparency. It's a shame, the device is great and really fast and nice to use. But lack of 5.1 is an absolute deal-breaker. Will return it.
customer_reviews.author: Eddie

customer_reviews.title: WiFi breaks in a matter of months
customer_reviews.text: I love this box, I really do. For all the things it can do read the other reviews....just a word of warning......I'm on my third box 😖 Amazon staff have been great replacing the faulty items but I always thought Nvidia was the best one to buy....turns out that after a couple of months of use the wi-fi packs in and that's that. Luckily, or not, it's been within the first year of ownership so Amazon have swapped no quibble....but three boxes now in 18mnths??? WTF Nvidia!
customer_reviews.author: Geraint4477

customer_reviews.title: This is the absolute best streaming box on the market
customer_reviews.text: Where to start. This is the absolute best streaming box on the market. If your a Kodi, Youtube, Amazon Prime, Netfix user this box streams so easily without buffering. Although it's more expensive than other Android boxes, save your money up for this box, you'll be future proofing yourself and will never regret buying it. 5 Star all day
customer_reviews.author: Paul Smart

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I have had several Android TV boxes ranging in prices from £40-£90, 90% of them all had problems especially one of the higher end priced items ie; freezing and other issues, so i decided to but the Nvidia Shield as it was available at a reduced price and WOW what a difference, streaming is a new experience no more freezing plus free games 4K playback excellent and extras i have never had before all in all a delight compared to the others. 5 STAR.
customer_reviews.author: tim cole

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: We looked forward to receiving this box very much but as an experienced Android box user we found this an extremely complicated box to use, for example there is no Google Play Store, no easy Browser to use either apart from their own pre loaded one ES Explorer and all apps have to be side loaded! and then they are difficult to locate, all in all a bad experience. Looks good though and works fast.
customer_reviews.author: A and C

customer_reviews.title: Amazing just amazing....life changing!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for hubby for christmas. Its been great I have hardly seen or heard from him. He is just in this little big world of Nvidia happiness. Apart from the divit that has appeared on the sofa and the task of having to hoover around him on a regular basis I couldn't be happier. Life has never been so peaceful 😂
customer_reviews.author: Jacqui

customer_reviews.title: Poor upgrades
customer_reviews.text: Had a previous shield , however this one seems to freeze quite a lot, and kicks me out and resets itself , most annoying is the fact the remote no longer charges via usb , the battery life is supposed to be 12 months , I’ve barley used it and it’s coming up battery critically low , very dissatisfied with what I thought was a nice bit of kit , also no longer can you turn the device off, you can merely put it to sleep, can’t see the point , so now have to pull the cable out the back , upgrades imo have spoiled a once great box
customer_reviews.author: Bri Davison

customer_reviews.title: Just think.... People are still buying Apple tvs... Lol
customer_reviews.text: I've had this shield for 4 years now. Since then I have purchased 4 more for each room of my house each connected to an av receiver. Simply put and coming from an I.T consultant its the best streaming box in the entire world. Its funny to think that there are still hundreds of people out there who still buy apple tvs! Lol! Very funny indeed. If your hesitating..... Don't and just buy it!
customer_reviews.author: Pspy

customer_reviews.title: You wont be sorry if you buy this
customer_reviews.text: I have had this for over a week now and I can say it is definitely worth the money. The primary reason for buying this was to replace my old WDTV Media Player which I use to play downloaded TV series and movies in mp4 and mkv file formats. This device certainly does that through VLC media player which plays just about everything. The menus etc are well laid out and the 4K feature is excellent. My old issue is with the remote. NVidia have tried to be fancy and modern but it really annoys me due to the volume control feature.
customer_reviews.author: James Turner

customer_reviews.title: Stop buying cheap android boxes and just invest in this ...
customer_reviews.text: Stop buying cheap android boxes and just invest in this beast. Unfortunately I spilled a can of coke on the controller the first day and destroyed it but the shield and remote control work extremely well. Quick tip: Install ES File Explorer to use the in app Google browser if needed. Chrome is not available on Android TV.
customer_reviews.author: Tim H.

customer_reviews.title: game changer
customer_reviews.text: The sheild TV is an amazing device. you can play games on it (it comes with a bunch of free AAA games btw) stream all your fav services and to your PC and it also acts as a digital assistant. It's a little on the expensive side though and although i don't regret my purchase i would have felt that a lower price would be more agreeable. The bottom line is that you probably already have devices that can do anything that the shield TV can do but probably don't have a device that can do it all in one and as well and seemlessly as this can. It's also smaller than i expected which is great
customer_reviews.author: John collins

customer_reviews.title: Android powered Media center, with Nvidia Gaming capabilities
customer_reviews.text: Why didn't I get one of these before?? Its an all in one solution for gaming, and all kinds of media streaming and casting. Yes you need a decent broadband and it works best through wired ethernet, but that's the same across the board nowadays for any kind of media or gaming platform. Google system, Nvidia graphics, and an interface thats simple to use yet very easy to customise. You can add so much like Steam, Netflix, Plex, almost anything theres a google app for, and with the right setup you can even watch live TV with a net tuner like HD Homerun. Best thing Ive bought in the sales in years
customer_reviews.author: Franco

customer_reviews.title: Great product don’t think twice just buy it !
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product can’t recommend it enough , Main features I use for streaming ,as my plex server I also play my pc games on it and it hasn’t let me down I would recommend not installing kodi on it as it has crashed a few times but that’s the only let down. Control is good take a little getting use to the buttons they are sensitive knock the wrong one and your back to the home screen. And the volume control is a little sensitive but that’s me being super picky.
customer_reviews.author: TattooDave

customer_reviews.title: May be a bit confusing for some as capable of so many things
customer_reviews.text: Poor remote design. Volume control almost impossible to use and remote is hard to pick up without activating it. Main unit sometimes slow to startup but perhaps I don't use it enough as feels like it is doing updates in the background. No Rakuten TV app on the Google play store for the Sheild. Game controller battery goes flat quickly - no easy/obvious way to turn it completely off and no removable battery. However, works reliably as a network/internet Plex server with external drive connected. Good picture quality through supported Google play movies, chilli and amazon apps.

customer_reviews.title: Feels Like A Apple Device

Which isn't a lot. Seems to be more game orientated than anything else. Would never purchase this product again, simply because of the price and capabilities and yes it's powerful but limited. Feeling like I'm using an apple device :)
customer_reviews.author: shrimpdepot

customer_reviews.title: Simply the best.
customer_reviews.text: Let's be honest, if you're reading these reviews, you haven't done your research right. The Nvidia shield is the undisputed champion of Android boxes. Sure, it's price is in a different league to your £40 odd pound boxes but you really do get what you pay for when it comes to these devices. The Shied is totally in a league of its own. It does not miss a beat, fast responsive and feature packed. Don't just take my word for it....read the internet reviews. Awesome piece of kit.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Great but not without faults.

customer_reviews.author: Eric Wilson

customer_reviews.title: The best Android TV biz around!
customer_reviews.text: This is really the best Android TV around. It’s continuously updated by Nvidia from a software perspective: there’s the new Android Oreo on it! Both controllers are already paired and their use is very intuitive. The most know TV on demand apps are already installed and they benefit of the Tegra processor that make this Android box the best one also to play video games. If you’re in doubt about buying an Android box, forget the cheap imitations around and get a pure Android TV box like the Nvidia Shield: you’ll never regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Sal

Crippled next to useless Google Playstore . No Browser installed or any worth installing in included appstore . You have to sideload them ... WTF ! 2 USB 3 ports . Do yourselves a favour and buy a proper android box like the Minix .
customer_reviews.author: elektric

customer_reviews.title: Nice device but spoiled by awful customer support

customer_reviews.author: Andrew smith

customer_reviews.title: How did I live without it
customer_reviews.text: Could not live without this. Also being able to play all the retro games such as sonic the hedgehog is a massive bonus. I was quite surprised by the size. It was a lot smaller than I was expecting. On saying that it is very stylish. Setting up couldn't be easier. Would 100% recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Android TV
customer_reviews.text: Fast, responsive, and update to Android 8. Caveats: you will need to sideload some of your applications as not all of them are Android TV compatible. However, the right stick of the controller works as mouse pointer, so it's easy to use any app even if it's not designed for Android TV. Regarding the WiFi, I was afraid because I've read some people having problems with that, however it's working very nicely for me and I'm being able to stream 1080p or even 4k content to it through a 5 Ghz wireless connection, and the router is not very close to it.
customer_reviews.author: Guillermo

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, as expected
customer_reviews.text: Excellent, as expected, but treat the remote with kid gloves when changing batteries as the internal battery holder will break if you so much as look at it wrong. Mine broke immediately, and only the complete package can be replaced by Amazon, but visit will send out spares if under warranty..it's a bit of a faff, but with proof of purchase and a couple of photos , they will ship out most spares.
customer_reviews.author: Choonzy

customer_reviews.title: An amazing media player with plenty under the hood!
customer_reviews.text: A superb Android powerhouse for everything in entertainment. Kodi on its own is an amazing experience with this machine but the games take it to a whole new level. CSR racing is absolutely awesome to play with the new type controller and the graphics are beautiful. It really does run like a dream and it's the best android media player on the market at this time.

customer_reviews.title: Don't love or hate it

customer_reviews.title: If we had a PC I'm sure the additional streaming features would be great but this is honestly well worth the money as ...
customer_reviews.text: This box does everything we need, from streaming films and TV in HD to playing games from the play store, GeForce now and even emulators. If we had a PC I'm sure the additional streaming features would be great but this is honestly well worth the money as is. +Great controller layout and battery life +Amazing selection of games and apps +Small enough to barely notice as part of a home media setup -Not enough storage for most users unless all you do is stream
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Best Media streaming device available
customer_reviews.text: The Best Media streaming device available. Quick, slick and easy and user friendly. Regular updates too, PC games available in the comfort of your living room. Only wish there was more USB ports. I have mine running as a plex server. Works flawlessly. Quiet, runs in the background. I can recommend this if you are looking for the best media streaming device that you just want it to work quietly in the background. Not cheap but holds their value because of the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Slam

customer_reviews.title: Nvidia SHIELD TV with Remote and Controller, Black
customer_reviews.text: for a couple of years ive been buying different type of boxes, trying to get one to suit my needs, then, after another of my boxes were showing their age, i decided to get the nvidia shield instead, and im delighted i did, streaming is brlliant, its very quick. and the gaming is good too. if you can afford to buy this do because in the long run itll be still working when your other boxes are showing their age.

customer_reviews.author: Ray to the Nard

customer_reviews.title: Very good apart from no surround sound.
customer_reviews.text: This is a really good Android tv box, with one huge error. It would be 5 stars otherwise, but this is a fundamental error in a TV box. They may squash the bug in a firmware update...

customer_reviews.title: Nvidia Shield performance
customer_reviews.text: I expected it to do more. It is more expensive than the standard Android box and more difficult to load. Miss the availability of a mouse for some navigation tasks and had a lot of early difficulty with the onscreen keyboard which by default was Russian rather than English. However, it does provide all the programmes I need but I will need time to determine if it provides full value for money
customer_reviews.author: Peter Usher

customer_reviews.title: The Best Yet!
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best media streaming device/android box that I have had. Yes, its a little expensive but you get what you pay for and having had one or two previous boxes before, this is so much better. I am not a huge gamer but the one or two games that I have downloaded have been great fun. Everything seems to run smoothly.
customer_reviews.author: Nickki

customer_reviews.title: Simply the Best
customer_reviews.text: What can I say different from everybody else. I bought this item not sure how it can be improved from the other leading steaming devices. It just is..!!! The simplicity of the device along with the ability to personalize makes it a cut above the rest. Yes you have to side load APK's, although after one or two you tube clips this a simple to do with very little effort. Yes, buffering is almost a thing of the past, KODI works seamlessly. On top of all this, the game functionality is awesome. Overall full marks and always great to see Nvidia continuously improving this product with regular updates.
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: great machine i sold my xbox and never buying one again,
customer_reviews.text: brillant machine you must have an nvidia graphic card to make it work smoothly and is more ideal if you have fibre optic connection , i have a good dsl one and its fine but my pc is super powerful so is hand in hand with the shield , no problems for me i stream games my own games and buy steam games as well , dont bother with their service that it comes with , you dont have to subcribe to anything to use the box just unpack , connect to pc go to steam use gamestream and wallah you got a xbox basically
customer_reviews.author: jo

customer_reviews.text: You like Netflix, Prime, BBC iPlayer, Kodi etc then this is the box for you. It is quick, very quick, easy to use with the remote or Game Controller. It's also has Nvidia Stream to play games, you can sub per month and stream games to the device (Network speed dependant) Also I can stream my steam games from my PC to the Shield in the living room with no lag (Network speed dependant)
customer_reviews.author: Wembley

customer_reviews.title: Quality device.
customer_reviews.text: Superb media device. Easy to set up. If you have a google account it will automatically connect to your network without having to input passwords and the like. Very fast and smooth operation. Easy and intuitive to use. Small and neat format. Remote is usable and sleek. Volume control is a little laggy and inaccurate as it is done via sliding your thumb up or down the remote. It is stupidly expensive for an android box but there really is no alternative. The vast number of Chinese boxes that litter Amazon are all underpowered and flakey units that most of the time don't work very well or at all.
customer_reviews.author: Mini-Me

customer_reviews.title: A little expensive, but is it? You get ...
customer_reviews.text: A little expensive, but is it? You get a high quality game pad, A slim line remote. Software support seems spot on. Don't forget the tegra GPU too. Technically this is a console killer for certain people, any power this little device might lack Vs a higher end system is offset by the ability to utilise Nvidia serves to do the heavy lifting and sending the computed data as a stream. For some, this is the next step in gaming. For me, it's mostly just an expensive future proof android box I wanted because my TV wasn't native android.
customer_reviews.author: "kevstarius"

customer_reviews.title: Great for expanding you viewing options and gaming
customer_reviews.text: Love the Nvidia Shield it does all i ask it to and plays games too. I would recommend this product to anyone looking to extend their viewing options. One thing I didn’t like is i have expanded the memory with a 62 gb usb stick. It seems to me that the shield gets too hot for the usb stick and does destroy it. That has been my experience, fortunately the usb was under warranty and i did get a replacement from scandisk.
customer_reviews.author: tfoxon

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this
customer_reviews.text: I was using an old desktop to maintain my media library but wanted an option that didn't need to be left on all the time (and wanted to get rid of the desktop as it was taking up a lot of room). Mainly using this with Plex and iPlayer and it works perfectly. The remote control is quite small, which is understandable as there aren't many buttons required anyway but it does keep going missing (my 6 & 2 year olds can't put things back when they've finished with them).
customer_reviews.author: robulon

customer_reviews.title: The best Android TV Box by far.
customer_reviews.text: This is the best Android TV Box available. Regular updates keep this device performing perfectly. The play store that comes installed is a bit limited compared to the full version, as there are many apps that will work on this device that are not available from the installed version of the play store, but they can be sideloaded using third party apps. Gaming works flawlessly, especially if it's connected via LAN. It comes with 16 Gb storage, which is sufficient for the built in Apps and some sideloaded Apps, but you can still expand the storage by connecting an external Hdd/SSD.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: The best android tv box I’ve ever owned!
customer_reviews.text: I use the nvidia shield wirelessly and I expected it to occasionally drop connections. I was than pleased to find it doesn’t. It’s responsive running Plex effortlessly and even remotely. I contemplated getting the latest version but having the game controller in with the deal I opted for this version and I’d definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Lloyd3013

customer_reviews.title: Great for Movies, Poor for High Quality Music
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best media boxes for playback of movies via Plex allowing full UHD 4K including HDR playback with Dolby Atmos / DTS-X however it always down samples hires audio to CD quality stereo which is a real disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: steveh

customer_reviews.title: Very slick once you get to know it!
customer_reviews.text: Great product, but quite a steep learning if you are new to android type systems. Other android boxes are much simpler to navigate and the play store is very poor unless you know how to side load apps. Prepare to spend some time on youtube to figure some of it out.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Rafferty

customer_reviews.title: Love this wee box
customer_reviews.text: I use this mainly for streaming Plex, Netflix or Amazon Prime Video and it handles all with ease. It is considerably more responsive than the built in apps on my Smart TV and outputs in Dolby Digital Plus rather than just Dolby Digital, although you will need a compatible audio receiver to take full advantage of this. I gather it also does HDR but as my TV isn't HDR compatible, I couldn't say for certain.

customer_reviews.title: To paraphrase "The Shield runs like scheitte out of a fat goose "

I have a couple of Wizard boxes , a Mecool M8S Pro L and while completely happy with them this leaves them standing. Go get one :)

customer_reviews.title: Simply the best

These are premium devices at the end of the day. The buttons on the TV remote aren't the most responsive but they still do the job well enough.

customer_reviews.title: Wow, worth every penny

customer_reviews.author: S.R.Lawlor

customer_reviews.title: Not for me.
customer_reviews.text: I thought long and hard over buying this streamer and maybe because I am not a gamer it wasn't for me. The box and remotes seemed to be very high quality. I also own the 4k fire stick so was able to compare side by side and could not see any reason for spending so much more. Amazon was as usual fantastic over the return.
customer_reviews.author: billywizzer

customer_reviews.title: Good at first

customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.text: As good as all the positive reviews state. A massive upgrade compared to my old Minix Neo U1. I didn't want to spend this much but well worth it.

customer_reviews.author: john mcelhatton

customer_reviews.title: From an Apple TV user
customer_reviews.text: I've had Apple TV's since the ATV2. I've always preferred them due to the speed and ease of use. That was until I purchased the Nvidia Sheild. Wow this thing is lightening fast. The menu is perfectly laid out and the OS in general is lovely. I thought it was pricey at first, but its actually worth the money in all honesty. Couldn't be happier. The only negative is the google voice control being a bit intermittent, but I haven't knocked a star off, as I don't think its all that important any way.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: The best streaming device you can buy.
customer_reviews.text: One of the best streaming devices you can buy. Fast and can handle almost all types of files, even 4k streaming (if your broadband is fast enough) and the ability to stream my PC games to the living room was excellent. The price may put some people off and I have bought some of the cheaper android boxes over the years but the Shield is worth the money for what it does.

This thing is brilliant. Smaller than I expected but very quick and powerful. Very easy to set-up too.

I've tried games out that I also own on my Xbox one x and they play just as good on here .

customer_reviews.author: Mel Woods

customer_reviews.text: Best of all TV boxes and of course most expensive. If you want just TV watching this is your box with a premium price tag for unparalleled performance and ease of use . But it can do so much more, HD android gaming, home server and game streaming via internet, yes you can play PC games using this without owning a PC like Fortnite and many more.
